about_the_game: Shattered Pixel Dungeon's complete soundtrack. Composed by Kristjan Thomas Haaristo (best known for his work in the Darkest Dungeon modding scene), some tracks inspired by the original Pixel Dungeon soundtrack by Cube_Code. Includes the title theme and a track for each of the game's five regions and bosses. Over 40 minutes of audio total in either high quality MP3 or WAV.
detailed_description: Shattered Pixel Dungeon's complete soundtrack. Composed by Kristjan Thomas Haaristo (best known for his work in the Darkest Dungeon modding scene), some tracks inspired by the original Pixel Dungeon soundtrack by Cube_Code. Includes the title theme and a track for each of the game's five regions and bosses. Over 40 minutes of audio total in either high quality MP3 or WAV.
legal_notice: Shattered Pixel Dungeon is open source software under the GPLv3 License, and is based on the freely available source code of Pixel Dungeon! The game is available in multiple languages thanks to support from the community via Transifex. All credits are given in the game's about section from the main menu, or in the languages tab of the settings menu.
name: Shattered Pixel Dungeon Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 65 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 450 MB available space

short_description: Shattered Pixel Dungeon's complete soundtrack. Composed by Kristjan Thomas Haaristo, some tracks inspired by the original Pixel Dungeon soundtrack by Cube_Code. Includes the title theme and a track for each of the game's five regions and bosses. ~20 minutes of audio total in high quality MP3.
